summary: Tested Chess Journey Comprehensive Progress Dashboard backend API. All 52 tests passed. The GET /api/journey/comprehensive endpoint returns all required sections with correct structure.

notes: Frontend requires Google OAuth - backend-only testing as requested. ChessJourney.jsx code review confirms proper implementation.

critical_code_review_comments: chess_journey_service.py: Well-structured with clear function separation
Opening names displayed as ECO codes (B01, C42, etc.) instead of full names - consider enriching with opening names for better UX
ChessJourney.jsx: Uses data-testid attributes for key components (implicit through existing shadcn components)
Good use of ProgressBar component for visualizing mastery percentages
Frontend properly handles empty states for all sections
seed_data_verified: User has 2 analyzed games, 30 imported games, and 9 mistake cards across 4 habits (endgame_technique, tactical_oversight, pawn_structure, piece_activity). 1 card mastered.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Chess Journey Comprehensive Progress Dashboard fully tested and working. The GET /api/journey/comprehensive endpoint returns all required sections: rating_progression (with history), phase_mastery (opening/middlegame/endgame), improvement_metrics (then vs now), habit_journey (conquered/in_progress/needs_attention), opening_repertoire (as_white/as_black with win rates), weekly_summary, and insights. Test file: /app/backend/tests/test_chess_journey.py. All 52 backend tests passed. Frontend ChessJourney.jsx on /progress route correctly renders all sections. Note: Frontend requires Google OAuth for testing.
